header.title: Anti-Spam ACP
header.description: Prevents spam on your phpBB3 forum.
header.author-notes:
PHP versions less than 5.1.0 are not supported.
Support by the author is only provided at http://www.lithiumstudios.org A small fee is required for support by the author unless otherwise specified by the author in the release topic. Bug reports are accepted and, if confirmed as a bug, you will receive support for fixing the bug for free by the mod author.
